about.summary: Tools for smoothing and tidying spatial features (i.e. lines and polygons) to make them more aesthetically pleasing. Smooth curves, fill holes, and remove small fragments from lines and polygons.
Tools for smoothing and tidying spatial features (i.e. lines and polygons) to make them more aesthetically pleasing. Smooth curves, fill holes, and remove small fragments from lines and polygons.

name: r-smoothr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-smoothr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/smoothr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/smoothr/smoothr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0a4e8760a37a0433dcd836bd9e6ffc61710be60e8faaca10aaccad25c824d3f3

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-sf
    - r-terra >=1.6_3
    - r-units
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-sf
    - r-terra >=1.6_3
    - r-units

test:
  requires:
    - r-testthat
    - r-sp
  files:
    - testthat.R
    - testthat/
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('smoothr')"           # [not win]
    - $R -f testthat.R                     # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('smoothr')\""  # [win]


about:
  home: https://strimas.com/smoothr/, https://github.com/mstrimas/smoothr
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Tools for smoothing and tidying spatial features (i.e. lines and polygons) to make them more aesthetically pleasing. Smooth curves, fill holes, and remove small fragments from lines and polygons.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - Rassine

# Type: Package
